mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NUM, BOARD_NUM, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NUM, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, REPLY_UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NUM = #{replyNum}
SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUM) FROM TBL_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
SELECT USER_NAME FROM TBL_USER U LEFT JOIN TBL_REPLY R ON U.USER_NUM=#{userNum} AND R.USER_NUM = #{userNum} WHERE U.USER_NUM = R.USER_NUM GROUP BY USER_NAME
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_BOARD PK_BNO) */ REPLY_NUM, REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_NUM, USER_NUM, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, REPLY_UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_REPLY WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum}
